mapper.select: select * from completion where completion_text = #{text} and source_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into completion (completion_id, completion_text, completion_A, completion_B, completion_C, completion_D, completion_E, completion_F, completion_parse, completion_level, source_id) values (#{completionId}, #{completionText}, #{completionA}, #{completionB}, #{completionC}, #{completionD}, #{completionE}, #{completionF}, #{completionParse}, #{completionLevel}, #{sourceId})
